title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Giving a loved one your undivided attention possibly feels as good as gifting gold. It can be hard to offer even a dear one your full concentration with so many devices and media sources competing for your time. Youre either out of practice in your communication skills or you simply dont make people your priority. But its possible a partner or close friend needs you today. The muted Pisces Moon might not be able to pump up the volume enough for your beloveds to speak loudly. But the cosmic energy flows with enough compassion and empathy for you to crane your heart to listen carefully. Unplug and connect. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
